entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.3°C

Visibility: 1.6 km

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
